title: Metagamer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a one-use Basic attack, a one-use Consigliere check, a Basic autovest, or roleblock immunity. You gain the chosen ability or attribute in the next GIM game whose host complies.
- Put on a bulletproof vest at night, granting yourself Basic defense for the night. You may only do this thrice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.

desc:
Post 1872
*I am 4 Parallel Universes ahead of you.*
